website_summaries.verdict: LG's entry-level OLED TV delivers flagship-level picture quality, making it the best high-end TV choice available.
pros: The LG B9 has spectacular image quality, second only to LG's more-expensive OLED TVs among models we've tested
It delivers perfect black levels, superb uniformity, wide viewing angles, accurate color and a great bright-room picture
Its striking design features a super-slim panel
It adds the HDMI 2.1 features and support for Amazon Alexa and Apple AirPlay 2 missing from 2018 versions
cons: It can't get as bright as LCD TVs

customer_reviews.title: The best picture for the money
customer_reviews.text: Impressive contrast, color, and picture quality. Moving from a Vizio P-Series, this is an incredible step up. This is the best 4K HDR experience you can buy for the money. The addition of a line out connection this year made integrating the TV with my older home theater receiver simple. I highly recommend this TV to any discerning fan of movies, television, or sports.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Dark on HDR, otherwise a terrific picture.
customer_reviews.text: It took some fussing over the settings before I could see who was sneaking up on the Witcher on the dark, dark HDR scenes. Regular TV looks great. Some reflections off of the screen during the day but hardly noticeable. Get this TV into a dark room tho, and the picture just absolutely pops. Does 420P all the way to 4K without issues. Games extremely well with Xbox One X. Cannot get much better than this. It is so good that I just bought my second one.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Pombrio

customer_reviews.title: Holy Mackerel!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful high resolution picture. OLED is definitely the best currently out there. WOW! Plus it has all the hookups and plug-ins you will need. Haven't found a single thing to complain about. Well maybe that it cost $1300 dollars, but that's what you pay if you want fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: KISMET

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality but dies after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this TV. The TV worked great for about 3 months and then the panel died. The TV was plugged into a surge protector and has never been moved since it was installed. LG is going to take 3 weeks to repair and haven't offered anything such a swap unit. I was looking online and this is not an isolated issue. I am quite disappointed and I don't think I will ever buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet great.
customer_reviews.text: This T.V. is hands down the best T.V. of this year. User friendly, simplistic and a lot of optimization options for you tech head's out there.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Antonio Negron

customer_reviews.title: Great buy to update that old tv
customer_reviews.text: Take the time to adjust the settings. It was too bright for us and with slight adjustment it is perfect. I suggest you make the cursor move more slowly and we made it smaller too. We replaced the LG we had that was 10 years old because it only had 1 hdmi port. The fire stick used that so it was annoying to get up to adjust the splitter. We are in our seventies. It was moved to another room.
customer_reviews.author: linda47

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture & ABSOLUTELY the best remote control
customer_reviews.text: There are many great televisions available - after looking and comparing side by sude I ranked LG Sony and Samsung of almost equal quality - but LG has the best ergonomic remote which put it at the number one position - Great & worth the money
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality on this screen is phenomenal. Top notch. Couldn't imagine a better picture quality. The OLED is perfect for sports too (one knock I have heard against products like the cheaper TCL 6-series LCDs). I wouldn't hesitate to recommend someone upgrade to this panel.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Super quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful image, bright and clear corner to corner. The native sound is better than the sound from the sound bar we had installed, first time that has happened in a TV in my lifetime. It takes a while to get used to the optical remote, but you do. The only complaint is that the built-in browser really isn't ready for prime time; poor typing interface, doesn't scroll on the screen properly once you get to a web site. If this were a hundred point scale I would give the TV a 96 because of that. But a wonderful TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S. Holman

customer_reviews.title: Sound issues
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, great picture quality, except sound in the low bass frequencies is very hard to hear. We got a soundbar with subwoofer which fixed this issue. A bit disappointed for the price of this high end TV
customer_reviews.author: emilyt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never imagined a TV could be so thin. The top of it is basically just a piece of glass. The picture quality really is as good as everyone says.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Sony Television that was dying a slow death with this LG. The picture quality is strikingly better and to date it is an excellent set. Hopefully it will last as long as the Sony it replaced did. Very happy to date.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brunkhorst

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this TV for a long time. I read the reviews and watched the YouTube videos on it. The problem was that I could not afford it. I'm on a fixed income but, when I received Trump's stimulus check I had to buy it. I'm enjoying it very much. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D.

customer_reviews.title: This TV Is Legit
customer_reviews.text: This TV is awesome! The picture is amazing, even without messing with the settings. The smart features are great as well. I would have liked to get the 77', but my wife thought it would be too big. Anytime i have had company over they remark on how crisp and nice the picture is compared to theirs (no joke). Great investment since i had my last flat screen for 10 years. I've been a Samsung guy, but did my do diligence and LG got me. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: We totally love it - and great sound too
customer_reviews.text: Great TV so far and great sound too. Our other TV was 18 years old so we are really in awe of the quality of the picture and sound. The 55" was perfect size for our home.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great image quality and picture control, and surprisingly good audio. Don’t enjoy the multitude of ads I’m exposed to though, including some random notifications that I can’t disable. At least it’s not frequent.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: OLED is terrific
customer_reviews.text: I love this OLED tv, I'd buy it again in a flash. OLED is the way to go, i had no idea what the difference was when enjoying my previous 4k tv. I don't even need side by side comparison anymore, i can tell the difference in true black, at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great TV worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice TV. The delivery, though, wasn’t as expected. They did bring it down to my basement but didn’t unbox it. It wasn’t hard to do after all. It was quite easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Just Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Recently read an accredited article comparing LG's OLED55BX (2020) to OLED55B9 (2019), which stated there was not significant difference in viewing and performance. The article suggested buying the 2019 model for starters like myself. I'm very satisfied with this OLED and feel very fortunate to buy a "like new" version. Highly recommend this TV even for casual TV watchers. Only disappointed I didn't buy an OLED sooner.
customer_reviews.author: UPDATED (09/20): Humble Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Amazing colors
customer_reviews.text: This TV is the real deal. OLED is the real deal, perfect blacks and jaw dropping contrast. The game mode is awesome too, you will not regret this purchase. Don’t buy a conventional led tv when you have LG OLED on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: The picture is the best I have seen on any screen. Quickly integrates into home network. Sound quality is good enough that I retired our sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: nice tv stupid remote
customer_reviews.text: the tv is beautiful (to my tired eyes anyway) but the "magic" remote is ill conceived at best. and call me old but I don't see the benefit of "smart" appliances nor do I care to talk to them
customer_reviews.author: pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME- Spend a few hundred more for OLEG
customer_reviews.text: Best sound. BEst picture. So glad I spent the extra money for this quality. Love it. Still trying to learn all the menu functions.
customer_reviews.author: MSTOW

customer_reviews.title: The perfect replacement for my dead Plasma!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is as good as my plasma. The blacks actually black and the colors are fantastic. I've watched a few 4K videos and it's impressive. When my plasma died I thought I'd be stuck with a lack luster LCD TV. If you need a replacement for your plasma, OLED is it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bertelson

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, needs better explanation of all the features and modes
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this tv after a couple weeks of use. The real cinema “dark” seems to be the most accurate color profile. Found the power button located under the screen at the center of the tv finally after thinking it might not have one. There isn’t a paper manual that covers all of the miriad of settings this tv offers - had to go online and search for review help on best setup.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: LG is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Best picture on any television I have ever seen. I really enjoy watching all the documentary selections on Curiosity Stream app.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing. Can't go wrong. My only complaint is the base that sits on a surface. It's very cheap and thin feeling. Not sure it would hold up in an earthquake. Better to mount the TV.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing, at first we thought maybe even too good! And we are happy that this smart TV that doesn’t require a special degree to find and use the apps!
customer_reviews.author: CPDupuis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing television. Wonderful picture, color quality. Good native audio. Easy set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Like eyes having sex
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, beautiful, slim, incredible, worth every penny including interest and tax. Get one you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture right out of the box and so easy to use. Connected to wifi in moments. The sound is amazing with no additional speakers, though it is in a small room. Excellent value on last year's model. So glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: B Bird

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy! Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t do games. The LG OLED TV is the best I’ve ever seen. Superb definition and color that makes the content come alive.
customer_reviews.author: James O. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: It is everything the info and reviews said about it. I followed the one reviewers quite line to set it up and am happy with it. Came boxed securely! I installed it on a wall mount with no troubles.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional design.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so vibrant and the picture is clear and photorealistic. My only criticism is that the power cord is on the right and the inputs are on the left.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture. Took a little longer to arrive than I had hoped but arrive it did, in perfect condition. It didn’t want to play nice with my Sony receiver so I had to change my setup to accommodate those issues, but got it handled without too much effort. All in all we are very happy with this purchase. It’s our second LG OLED and both are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Improperly or Defective from Seller?
customer_reviews.text: Currently waiting for UPS to pickup this TV so I can get a refund. The TV I received is damaged, but the box does not look damaged. Left side of the screen is flickering. It is not the source of video because it happens even when it is on TV/blank antenna screen. Otherwise, this TV is great. I ended up buying the same year/model from local best buy store.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great as a monitor. 120hz 1440p
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a PC monitor and it serves that use exceptionally. Being able to run it at 1440p 120hz is amazing for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: TBJr135

customer_reviews.title: Was a good upgarde
customer_reviews.text: Good TV upgrade from an older 42". I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv. Great picture and wonderful features. Easily connects to internet
customer_reviews.author: Kassie T.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best entry level OLED TVs out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exquisite OLED TV from LG. Although the Shipment required a signed receipt, the TV was left at my front door but it was delivered on time and handled safely.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend?
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Great picture quality, good for gaming as well. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Just as described - great picture but requires some adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: Although it has been hard to get remote synced with my home theater system, picture quality is as good as advertised once I made the adjustments recommended by Consumer Reports.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Gov worker

customer_reviews.title: Works well - exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, good size for my room, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture, decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picturevright out of box. Easy setup. Easy adjustments if desired. Decent internal sound/speakers. Good suite of apps, good connections. Very pleased overall after 1+ month.
customer_reviews.author: IndyZen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing tv
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to not like about this tv. Picture looks stunning for gaming , movies , normal tv and sports.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Mariades

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture, color is great and speakers sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jaspers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and is very good picture quality love and I always will
customer_reviews.author: Jenissa Nunez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL !
customer_reviews.text: caught a great deal for 4TH of July Holiday....so far A GREAT INVESTMENT.....LOVE IT, will include future update!
customer_reviews.author: luv4cat

customer_reviews.title: B9 UHD 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: Love the UHD TV. This is one of the best tv ever. I love so much. The picture quality is excellent. I use it mostly for gaming and its amazing. Clear and 4K tv rated 3rd best in tv.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chan

customer_reviews.title: Cinema Quality Tv
customer_reviews.text: It gives the same quality of Cinema screen, amazing colors and response time for gaming. OLED is the future of tv and all companies will embark soon, samsung etc.
customer_reviews.author: e1494

customer_reviews.title: Unparallel screen quality - no ESPN app a bummer
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous screen quality. Navigation is not super user-friendly (hate the pointer). If you're a sport fan, the lack of the ESPN app is a major bummer. Even screen-mirroring from a device is a poor alternative (vision is choppy). Get your act together LG and make available the ESPN app.
customer_reviews.author: zyxw

customer_reviews.title: Value per dollar
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest and smallest full featured 4k OLED tv you can get. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: It's smart featurs are useful. Picture and brightness is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It's so thin, picture quality is serious, and the features are useful.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Strickland

customer_reviews.title: OLED all the way
customer_reviews.text: I love my new tv. It is slim, crisp & so sharp. Barring anything crazy like burning out within 6 months, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainNemo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture and sound quality! Comes loaded with tons of apps. Definitely one of the thinnest TVs you’ll find. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Have nothing bad to say about this television. Rewatching shows I’ve seen before, I can really see the difference in picture quality. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as clear as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a much clearer picture. Wish I had gone with LED and not OLED SAVED A GOOD BIT OF MONEY BY DOING THAT.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Still figuring out all the features. I recommend this TV highly. I am comparing to an older Vizio but still very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lunday

customer_reviews.title: Great OLED TV
customer_reviews.text: Great, the darks are amazing. I enjoy the HDR immensely. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Replace
customer_reviews.text: This tv needs to be returned and replaced. It is too heavy for me to remove from the wall mount. What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Gruskin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tv
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv , I love the picture and the web browser.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L. King

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Factory damaged. Ok quality but not worth premium
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged with a warped plastic corner which looked like faulty injection molding. Picture quality is nice but not worth the premium. LG interface is not very intuitive
customer_reviews.author: tomer tzur

customer_reviews.title: Best TV of 2019
customer_reviews.text: What can I say once you go oled you can’t go back
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Audio Boom
customer_reviews.text: When you change channels there is a very loud audio boom! For such an expensive product that seems like a big fault.
customer_reviews.author: samuel mbugua

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Back is black. If there is no light on you can't see anything when the screen is black.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: LG OLED55B9PUA B9 Series 55" 4K Ultra HD Smart OLED TV (2019)
product_meta.description: Size:55"| Style:TVWhen you're ready to upgrade TVs, elevate your entertainment experience to LG OLED TV. It brings greater richness in color, crisp detail and perfect black to movies, shows, sports and gaming. Picture and sound benefit from LG's AI-powered processor, α7 Gen 2 Intelligent Processor. Picture and sound are elevated with premium Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos. And the technology of LG ThinQ with the voice control of the Google Assistant and Alexa. Service limited to certain languages. Some features require 3rd party service subscriptions. Google is a trademark of Google LLC.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One LG B9 Series 55" 4K UHD Smart OLED TV, 2019 model, one Magic remote with batteries, one power cable and user manual
TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 48.4" W x 27.7" H x 1.8" D | With Stand – 48.4" W x 29.2" H x 9.7" D
Other specifications: Power Supply (Voltage, Hz) – AC 120V, 50/60Hz | Standby Power Consumption – Under 0.5W | Power Consumption – 109.3W | Refresh Rate – 120Hz
LG TVs are the first to integrate both the Google Assistant and Alexa with LG ThinQ AI technology
Images, action and color are brought to new life to instantly enhance picture quality through LG's best 4K processor, empowered by AI at its core

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars320 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
